body_html:
Is this legit? You have a different network if you don't have dropout, and that's effectively what this patch is doing.

Perhaps what you actually wanted to do is ignore dropout in inference mode, because in that case no dropout occurs. That's OK (test for THAT case), and error if someone tries to export in training mode. An example where we do this test already is FeatureDropout.
body_text:
Is this legit?  You have a different network if you don't have dropout, and that's effectively what this patch is doing.
Perhaps what you actually wanted to do is ignore dropout in inference mode, because in that case no dropout occurs. That's OK (test for THAT case), and error if someone tries to export in training mode. An example where we do this test already is FeatureDropout.
body:
Is this legit?  You have a different network if you don't have dropout, and that's effectively what this patch is doing.

Perhaps what you actually wanted to do is ignore dropout in inference mode, because in that case no dropout occurs. That's OK (test for THAT case), and error if someone tries to export in training mode. An example where we do this test already is FeatureDropout.
